item.title: In another incident, George Kaplan testified, he got a call on the intercom at Sean Combs’s...

item.description: Sean “Diddy” Combs’s federal sex-trafficking trial continues on Day 9, with Kid Cudi and ex-employee George Kaplan expected to testify.

Supreme Court upholds fraud conviction of government contractor
item.description: The case in Philadelphia involved Alpha Painting & Construction and a project manager, Stamatios Kousisis, who was convicted of fraud in 2018.
